name: Master Bus Driving
description:
Master Bus Driving!!!
Start your training as an inexperienced bus driver for whom it is impossible to complete the missions and levels. This fast-paced game times your precision of driving and parking skills. The passengers are waiting to get to their destination, SO HURRY UP!
features:
•Cool jumbo city buses
•Realistic city environments
•Two touch steering options with the built-in accelerometer
•Different camera angles that give you more control
•Amazing 3D graphics
•Extreme precision driving and sound simulations
